attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Specifically the provision that when a defence solicitor goes into private consultation with a client the "time clock" on the suspects detention stops until the private consultation is concluded to prevent unnecessarily wasted police investigation time being used by slow defence solictors.

rejection.details: Please put spaces between the words in your title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
